homepageLine: The Complete & Most Advanced Sonivo Center Software for Your Business
homepageSublineDes: Sonivo AI offers a powerful call flow builder that enables seamless customer interactions with customizable nodes like text prompts, SMS messages, AI assistant responses, and more. Design tailored workflows by adding and connecting these nodes to handle every stage of customer engagement. Easily configure automated responses, direct users to relevant support, and manage escalations within a single visual interface. With Sonivo AI, creating complex call flows is intuitive, flexible, and fully adaptable to business needs.
homepageSubline2Des: Introducing our advanced agent access feature, designed to empower your call center operations! With the ability to create multiple agents, you can easily assign devices tailored for seamless customer support. Whether handling inbound inquiries or making outbound calls, our system ensures efficient call management. Elevate your team's performance and enhance customer satisfaction with our intuitive interface!
homepageSubline3Des: Sonivo AI's Call Broadcast feature enables effortless bulk calling, allowing you to reach thousands of contacts in minutes. Upload a contact list with customizable variables for each call, such as names or specific messages, to create a personalized experience at scale. Sonivo AI handles the scheduling, delivery, and tracking, ensuring efficient outreach and real-time results. Streamline your campaigns and maximize impact with intelligent, automated call broadcasting.
homepageSubline4Des: Unlock the potential of AI with our tailored training data feature! By providing your company's specific information or product details, our AI can be expertly trained to assist with both incoming and outgoing calls. This ensures that every interaction is knowledgeable and personalized, enhancing customer experience. Elevate your call center's efficiency and responsiveness with AI that truly understands your business!
homepageSubline5Des: Revolutionize your communication strategy with our integrated IVR and dialer system! Effortlessly dial calls and create dynamic IVR solutions for both incoming and outgoing calls. This allows you to streamline customer interactions, ensuring quick responses and efficient routing. Enhance your call management experience and elevate customer satisfaction with a seamless IVR and dialer solution!
bulletLIne: One app with multiple uses for business, education, surveys, inbound and outbound calls, and much more.
